Breakpoints

We use the default media queries as breakpoints for our site. Our nav breakout is at ≥ 48em or ≥ 768px.


/* Mixin */
@sm: ~"screen and ( min-width: 35.5em )";
@md: ~"screen and ( min-width: 48em )";
@lg: ~"screen and ( min-width: 64em )";
@xl: ~"screen and ( min-width: 80em )";

/* Media query gte 48em (768px) */
.element {
  font-size: 12px;
  @media @md {
    font-size: 16px;
  }
}
